name: BadaBoonker
description:
Hide in bunkers from nuclear explosions and find what caused this

Controls: AD - Movements J - SHOOT W/SPACE - Jump

Made for Ludum Dare 51 (Compo) in 2 days (+ 1hour for fixing a bug).

This is the post version with fixed bug that getting stuck in platforms.
You can download LD51 version.

LD post:  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/badaboonker

Unity / Aseprite / Reaper / PhasePlant / Famitracker / Audacity
